title: Fred Bateman
text: James Fred Bateman, Jr. (1937 – January 10, 2012) was a noted economic historian. He served as the "Nicholas A. Beadles" Professor in the <a href="Terry%20College%20of%20Business">Terry College of Business</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Georgia">University of Georgia</a>. Bateman's main areas of research were US 19th century agricultural and industrial economic history. He served from 1982–83 as president of the <a href="Business%20History%20Conference">Business History Conference</a> and in 2010 he was elected as a Fellow of the <a href="Cliometric%20Society">Cliometric Society</a>.
